item.title: 美国股票基金在巨型股财报发布前吸引资金流入
item.description: 截至1月28日当周，美国股票基金资金再度涌入，尽管市场对特朗普总统最新关税威胁感到不安，但大型股财报季前乐观预期仍为其提供了支撑。【原文：U.S. equity funds experienced renewed inflows in the week to January 28, supported ​by upbeat expectations ahead of mega-cap ‌earnings despite jitters over President Donald Trump's latest tariff threats.】

item.title: 礼来公司斥资35亿美元在宾夕法尼亚州建厂，推动美国制造业发展
item.description: 礼来公司周五宣布将在宾夕法尼亚州新建一家制药工厂，这是该公司为扩大美国本土产能、强化医疗供应链而设立的第四个新生产基地。【原文：Eli Lilly announced on Friday that it will build a pharmaceutical manufacturing facility in Pennsylvania, its fourth new site in an effort to expand U.S. production and bolster medical supply chains.】

item.title: 埃克森美孚表示拥有开采委内瑞拉高成本原油所需技术
item.description: 埃克森美孚首席执行官达伦·伍兹周五向分析师表示，该公司拥有从委内瑞拉开采高成本原油所需的技术。【原文：Exxon Mobil CEO Darren Woods told analysts on Friday that the company has the technology that would be needed to produce higher cost barrels from Venezuela.】

item.title: 闪迪股价飙升，强劲的人工智能需求推动业绩预期大幅上调
item.description: 闪迪公司股价周五大幅上涨，此前这家数据存储企业公布的第三季度利润和营收远超分析师预期，并延长了一项重大供应协议。此轮上涨主要得益于人工智能驱动的数据存储需求激增。【原文：Sandisk shares rallied on Friday, after the data storage firm projected third-quarter profit and revenue well above analysts' estimates and extended a major supply ​deal, powered by a surge in AI-driven demand for data storage.】

item.title: 全球股票基金连续第三周吸引资金流入
item.description: 截至1月28日当周，全球股票基金连续第三周出现资金流入，这得益于市场对企业盈利前景的乐观预期。与此同时，在特朗普政府可能采取关税措施的不确定性背景下，黄金和债券基金等避险资产也受到稳健需求支撑。【原文：Global equity funds had a third straight week of inflows in the week to January 28 on upbeat earnings expectations, while ​safe-haven assets like gold and bond funds also saw ‌solid demand amid uncertainty over potential U.S. tariff moves under President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 科赛普特股价暴跌，因FDA信函揭露药物遭拒前曾发出警告
item.description: 科赛普特治疗公司股价周五暴跌16%，此前美国食品药品监督管理局（FDA）修正后的"完整答复函"显示，该机构曾"多次"警告该公司不要提交其药物申请。【原文：Shares of Corcept Therapeutics fell 16% on Friday after a corrected "complete response letter" from the U.S. Food and Drug Administration ​showed the agency had warned the company "on several occasions" not to ‌submit its drug application.】

item.title: 美国与危地马拉签署互惠贸易协定
item.description: 美国贸易代表办公室周五发表声明称，美国贸易代表杰米森·格里尔与危地马拉经济部长签署了美危互惠贸易协定。【原文：U.S. Trade Representative Jamieson Greer on Friday signed a U.S.-Guatemala agreement on reciprocal trade with the country's economic minister, the USTR's office said in a statement.】

item.title: 庞巴迪股价暴跌9%，因特朗普威胁对加拿大飞机征收关税并取消认证
item.description: 庞巴迪公司股价周五暴跌9%，此前美国总统唐纳德·特朗普威胁要取消这家公务机制造商大型客舱飞机的认证资格，"以及所有加拿大制造的飞机"，并对新飞机征收50%的进口关税，直至加拿大认证其美国竞争对手湾流公司最新生产的飞机。【原文：Bombardier shares dropped 9% on Friday after U.S. President Donald Trump threatened to decertify the private jet maker’s large-cabin planes "and all ​Aircraft made in Canada" and slap 50% import tariffs on new planes until Canada certified ‌the latest aircraft produced by U.S. rival Gulfstream.】

item.title: Franklin Templeton's profit rises as market rally boosts income from fees
item.description: Investment manager Franklin Resources , better known as Franklin Templeton, reported a jump in first-quarter profit on Friday as rallying equities markets boosted investment management fees.

item.title: US producer prices accelerate in December on services
item.description: U.S. producer prices increased more than expected in December, with businesses appearing to pass on higher costs from ​import tariffs, suggesting inflation could pick up in the ‌months ahead.

item.title: Kuaishou's e-commerce unit fined $3.8 million by Chinese regulator
item.description: Chinese regulator fined Kuaigou, an e-commerce unit of live-streaming service provider Kuaishou Technology , 26.7 million yuan ($3.84 million) over what it described as several "illegal acts."

item.title: Charter Communications sheds fewer broadband subscribers than expected
item.description: Charter Communications reported a smaller-than-expected decline in broadband subscribers for the fourth quarter on Friday, helped by ​its internet offerings that can be bundled with ‌high-speed mobile services.

item.title: 金银铜价暴跌，惊慌的投资者发现重力效应
item.description: 金、银、铜价格周五大幅下跌，此前本周曾创下历史新高。随着市场对美国将大幅降息的预期逐渐消退，美元汇率趋稳，紧张的投资者纷纷锁定利润。【原文：Gold, silver and copper prices tumbled on ​Friday after hitting record highs this week, as jittery investors moved to lock in ‌profits with hopes for aggressive U.S. interest rate cuts starting to fade and the dollar steadying.】

item.title: 巴拿马总统表示港口将在法院裁决后正常运营
item.description: 巴拿马总统何塞·劳尔·穆利诺表示，尽管最高法院作出废除香港和记黄埔旗下子公司所持关键港口合同的裁决意义重大，但该国港口运营将不受影响。【原文：Panamanian President Jose Raul Mulino said that despite the significance of the supreme Court decision to annul key port contracts held by a subsidiary of Hong Kong-based CK Hutchison, ports in the country will operate without disruption.】

item.title: 高露洁-棕榄公司预测全年销售额将保持强劲增长，因必需品消费持续坚挺
item.description: 牙膏制造商高露洁-棕榄公司周五预测全年销售额将超出华尔街预期，得益于拉丁美洲和欧洲等市场对基本家用必需品的稳定需求。【原文：Toothpaste maker Colgate-Palmolive forecast annual sales above Wall Street estimates on Friday, benefiting from steady demand for essential household staples in markets such as Latin America and Europe.】

item.title: Regeneron季度利润超预期，得益于Dupixent强劲表现
item.description: 美国制药商再生元制药公司周五公布的第四季度利润超出分析师预期，这得益于其湿疹治疗药物Dupixent的强劲需求。【原文：U.S. drugmaker Regeneron Pharmaceuticals beat analysts' estimate for fourth-quarter profit on Friday, helped by strong demand for its eczema treatment, Dupixent.】

item.title: 特朗普提名沃什为下一任美联储主席
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普周五表示，他已提名前美联储理事凯文·沃什接替将于五月卸任的主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔，出任下一任美联储主席。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Friday said he had picked former Federal Reserve governor Kevin Warsh as the next head of the Federal Reserve, when Chair Jerome Powell steps down in May.】

item.title: 金融科技贷款机构SoFi利润激增，得益于基于费用的业务强劲增长
item.description: SoFi Technologies周五报告称，受强劲贷款需求和基于费用的业务快速增长推动，其第四季度利润实现增长。【原文：SoFi Technologies reported a rise in fourth-quarter profit on Friday, lifted by strong loan demand and rapid growth in its fee‑based businesses.】

item.title: 印度电商公司Meesho季度亏损激增，主要源于支出增加
item.description: 印度电商公司Meesho在去年12月轰动性上市后的首份财报显示，由于成本上升，其季度亏损大幅扩大。【原文：Indian e-commerce firm Meesho's quarterly loss widened sharply in its first earnings report since the blockbuster market debut in December last year, as costs rose.】

item.title: 美国运通预计2026年盈利前景乐观，因富裕客户消费保持稳定
item.description: 美国运通周五公布的年度利润预测值普遍高于华尔街预期，凸显出这家信用卡巨头主要由富裕客户组成的用户群体在宏观经济不确定性加剧的背景下仍保持着强劲消费力。【原文：American Express forecast annual profit largely above Wall Street expectations on Friday, underscoring resilient spending by the credit card giant's largely affluent ​customer base amid broader economic uncertainty.】

item.title: 飞机租赁商在风险累积中稳步前行
item.description: 大西洋两岸的裂痕与动荡的市场或许令投资者心神不宁，但拥有全球半数机队的飞机租赁巨头们表示，他们的行业从未像现在这样充满韧性。【原文：A transatlantic rift and jittery markets may be unnerving investors, but the aircraft leasing giants that own half the global fleet say their industry has rarely felt more resilient.】

item.title: 特朗普提名前美联储官员沃什执掌美国央行
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普周五提名前美联储理事凯文·沃什接替杰罗姆·鲍威尔担任美联储主席，鲍威尔的任期将于五月结束。此举让这位美联储的常年批评者获得了实践其货币政策"体制变革"理念的机会——此时正值特朗普政府推动加强对美联储控制权之际。【原文：President Donald Trump on Friday chose former Federal Reserve Governor Kevin Warsh to head the U.S. central bank when Jerome Powell's leadership term ends in May, giving a frequent Fed critic a chance to put his idea ​of monetary policy "regime change" into practice at a moment when the president has pushed for more control over the central bank.】

item.title: 美国最大电网用电需求预计将逼近冬季纪录
item.description: 根据运营商最新七日预测，美国最大电网PJM互联电网周五的电力需求预计将达到约141吉瓦的峰值，仅略低于该电网冬季历史最高纪录。【原文：Power demand on the largest U.S. electric grid on Friday is expected to peak at about 141 gigawatts, just shy of the all-time winter record on the PJM Interconnection, according to the operator's latest seven-day forecast.】

item.title: 晨间竞价：多强才算过强？
item.description: 迈克·多兰和ROI团队本周末最期待阅读、观看和收听的内容。【原文：Everything Mike Dolan and the ROI team are excited to read, watch and listen to over the weekend.】

item.title: 保险经纪公司怡安因风险管理实力提升利润大幅增长
item.description: 保险经纪公司怡安周五报告称，受其风险管理服务需求强劲推动，第四季度经调整利润大幅增长。【原文：Insurance broker Aon reported a jump in fourth-quarter adjusted profit on Friday on the back of robust demand for its risk management offerings.】

item.title: 得益于低成本石油生产，埃克森美孚第四季度利润超出华尔街预期
item.description: 埃克森美孚周五公布的第四季度财报超出华尔街预期，其在盈利丰厚的二叠纪盆地和圭亚那资产的原油产量提升，助力这家美国最大石油生产商业绩增长。【原文：Exxon Mobil beat Wall Street targets in fourth-quarter earnings reported on Friday, with higher oil production in profitable Permian Basin and Guyana assets helping to boost the No. 1 U.S. oil producer's results.】

item.title: 威瑞森预测年度利润将大幅增长，无线用户增长创六年新高
item.description: 美国电信巨头威瑞森周五公布的年度利润和自由现金流预测超出市场预期，假日高峰期的激进促销策略助力该公司实现六年来最高的季度无线用户净增量。【原文：Verizon forecast annual profit and free cash flow above market expectations on Friday, as aggressive promotions during peak ​holiday period helped the U.S. carrier post its highest quarterly ‌wireless subscriber additions in six years.】

item.title: 雪佛龙第四季度盈利超预期，瞄准委内瑞拉投资机遇
item.description: 雪佛龙公司第四季度利润下滑，但仍超出市场预期。该公司正致力于削减成本、提升运营效率，以应对2025年全年原油价格走低的局面。【原文：Chevron's fourth-quarter profits fell but came in ahead of estimates as it focused on cutting costs and making its operations more efficient to contend with lower crude prices throughout 2025.】

item.title: 瑞典汽车零部件供应商奥托立夫预计2026年将无有机销售增长，第一季度盈利能力持续萎缩
item.description: 瑞典汽车安全设备制造商奥托立夫周五预测，受汽车产量停滞影响，2026年公司将无有机销售增长，且第一季度盈利能力较去年同期大幅下滑。该公司同时公布第四季度利润下滑。【原文：Swedish car safety gear maker Autoliv , predicted on Friday no organic sales growth in 2026 amid stalling vehicle production, and much lower profitability in the first quarter than a year ago, as it reported a drop in fourth-quarter profit.】

item.title: 华尔街本周展望财报密集周，就业数据将考验美股走势，微软股价暴跌后市场承压
item.description: 在科技巨头微软发布令人失望的财报拖累股市指数后，包括谷歌母公司Alphabet和亚马逊在内的又一批巨额企业财报，将在未来一周考验美国股市。【原文：Another huge batch of corporate earnings including from megacaps Alphabet and Amazon will test the U.S. stock market in the coming week after a disappointing report ​from heavyweight Microsoft weighed on equity indexes.】
